answerText: Captain Pantoja and the Special Service [or Pantaleón y las visitadoras] [10] The even-numbered chapters of this novel contain Pedro Comacho's outlandish soap operas while the odd-numbered chapters deal with Marito's incestuous relationship with the title relative.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 10 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, the main character takes on Olga Arellano, known as the Brazilian, as a mistress, and is assisted by Chuchupe and Porfirio Wong in his mission. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which a straitlaced Peruvian army officer is tasked in creating a prostitution service for a group of demoralized army troops in the Amazon.
